review: I bought 2 of these when they were first released for half price. They came preactivated on my Amazon account. I plugged them into the USB ports on my TVs for power rather than the wall so that they shut down when the TV is off. The interface is great and responsive. I intended to give them away as Christmas gifts but I liked them too much. I even have one of them plugged into my Smart TV because I like the interface much better. These were a steal for the $20 I paid for each of them. If I see another good deal on them I will probably put them on my other TVs.I am a little worried that the remotes might interfere with each other if you try to use multiple Fire Sticks in the same area. With one in the living room and one in my bedroom it hasn't been an issue. I haven't tried the Android remote app yet.
